actions: *Melee Weapon Attack:* +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit:* 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.
name: Mule
traits: The mule is considered to be a Large animal for the purpose of determining its carrying capacity.
The mule has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.
